body.p:
Frankfort Ky
Ja 1861
Beriah Mgoffin Govenor

in the year 1860 you you the petition of is good citizen Breathitt County Respited a fine that was recovered against L D Landsaw in the Breathitt circuit court for as my Recolection serves me $20 the Respite is now out & L D Landsaw is Exceedingly poor and as you Know time hard and I state to you that he is wholy unable to pay the fine to force him to pay said fine would be to place upon the charity of a cold & unfriendly wold a wife Lot of small children wherefore I ask you in your mercy to remit said fine

Breathitt Cir. Ct
Remitted
B. M
$20 } Adultery
L D Landsaw
Issd Jany 30.1861
